content.p: Tribal Worldwide Internship Programme Description: Tribal Worldwide Malaysia is a full-service agency that provides end-to-end digital solutions. Internationally, Tribal Worldwide is part of Publicis Omnicom Group. In Malaysia, we are part of the Foetus International group, Malaysiaâ€™s largest and most diversified consortium of brand and communications specialists. Tribal Worldwide is also rank as one of the largest and most award-winning advertising networks in the world, with 51 offices in countries throughout the Americas, Europe, Asia-Pacific and Africa. We provide the service of developing Communications, Communities and Commerce in the digital realm. At Tribal Worldwide, we apply Creativity & Innovation, and Data & Analytics across everything we do. We believe in the following guiding principles: We work on diverse international brands such as Volkswagen, Proton, Fitness First, Nippon Paint and Tourism Malaysia. At Tribal Worldwide Malaysia, we believe nothing is impossible and we strive to bring the best solutions and innovations to all our clienteles. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
